plugin.name: CDplayer
plugin.title: CDplayer
plugin.desc: CDplayer beta test * Add cover art support * Add seek support in tracks * Bug fix OSX support * Bug fix playlist items on Squeezeplay * bug fix accented chars support * bug fix accented chars in Applicatio data name in Windows * Change pause support to 7.3 methods * remove need for external app to tidy up cdda2wav orphan processes on Windows.
plugin.creator: bpa
